definition: to be a different person/not to be one's usual self
two/both/some/a few/tael, unit of weight equal to 50 grams (modern) or 1⁄16 of a catty 斤[jin1] (old)

sentences.english: Well, I must say, you are looking quite a different person.
sentences.chinese: 喂，我得說，你現在完整判若兩人。

sentences.english: The new husband didn't appear to be he person that he was when I had money.
sentences.chinese: 新婚丈夫與我有錢的時候相比判若兩人。
